remarks: Cancellation law for mixed addition and group division.  ( ~ pnpcan2 analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 15-Feb-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
grpdivf.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
grpdivf.3 $e |- D = ( /g ` G ) $.
grpopnpcan2 $p |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A G C ) D ( B G C ) ) = ( A D B ) ) $.
